item.title: Three defensive plays with good-looking charts as markets shudder
item.description: David Keller breaks down the charts on AEP, Bristol-Myers and British American Tobacco.

item.title: Cheap? Nvidia valuation nearing 10-year lows, according to Bernstein
item.description: The bellwether AI chip manufacturer has pulled back almost 14% in 2025. Earlier Tuesday, it was down almost 17% year to date.

item.title: Goldman Sachs rolls out suite of downside protection ETFs as market volatility picks up
item.description: New buffer funds from Goldman Sachs have a few wrinkles that make them different from the biggest competitors in the space.

item.title: Bank of America slashes Tesla price target as U.S. tariffs become reality
item.description: Levies on Canadian, Mexican and Chinese imports took hold on Tuesday, with China and Canada issuing retaliatory duties.

item.title: Here are Tuesday's biggest analyst calls: Nvidia, Tesla, Roku, Marvell, Sunrun, Okta, Planet Fitness, Disney and more
item.description: Here are Tuesday's biggest calls on Wall Street.
